English: Hunan embroidery, one of the four major traditional styles of Chinese embroidery (the other three being `蘇繡~|苏绣[Su1 xiu4], `粵~`繡~|粤绣[Yue4 xiu4] and `蜀繡~|`蜀~绣[Shu3 xiu4])

d.f: `民國~`以後~`興起~`於~`湖~`南~`的~`刺繡~。`以~`長短~`針法~，`分~`遠近~`層次~、`表現~`立體感~`的~`繡~`法~。

English: Hunan embroidery, one of the four major traditional styles of Chinese embroidery (the other three being `蘇繡~|苏绣[Su1 xiu4], `粵~`繡~|粤绣[Yue4 xiu4] and `蜀繡~|`蜀~绣[Shu3 xiu4])
